body.p: This documents provides a high level jManage roadmap. This roadmap will change based on the needs of the jManage users.

2.0 release
- Dashboards.
- Non-JMX Application connector framework.
- Application heartbeat monitor.
- Database monitoring (Oracle).
- Historical Graphing. (coming soon)

3.0 release
- Performance management.
- Root cause analysis.
- Operating system monitoring.
- Application specific knowledge modules.
- Network interface monitoring.
If there are other features that you would like to see in jManage, please add them here.
